H0.text: Electron is the atomic structure with the greatest mass.

H1.text: Neutron is the atomic structure that has the greatest mass.

H2.text: The nucleus has the greatest mass among atomic structures.

H3.text: Proton has the greatest mass among atomic structures.

A4.text: Almost all of the mass of an atom is located in the nucleus, with a very small contribution from the electron cloud.
